pages.text: The $(mob)Zombie Villager$() is a $(l:minecraft_villager)$(mob)Villager$() that has been turned into a $(l:minecraft_zombie)$(mob)Zombie$(). It is functionally identical to the latter.$(p)It spawns in the same places as $(l:minecraft_zombie)$(mob)Zombies$(), but can also appear if one kills a $(l:minecraft_villager)$(mob)Villager$().$(p)Affecting one with $(thing)Weakness$() by any mean and feeding it a $(item)Golden Apple$() will cure it after a few minutes.
